textBox.richText: The Proclaimers reckon they Would Walk 500 Miles. I’ve just driven 500 and I'm stuffed, I’m not even going to contemplate walking it. Today our drive took us from our overnight stop at San Luis Obispo to our final destination of Newport Beach. We enjoyed a nice breakfast at Santa Barbara and strolled around Santa Monica and Venice Beach during lunch. On our way to Newport Beach we also took a few detours for stops at Malibu, Manhattan and Huntington beaches. Due to LA traffic we arrived here late so there’s no report on Newport Beach so far. We’ll leave that until tomorrow. The only news I can share is that someone has managed to pinch my VISA card number and has enjoyed withdrawing close on AUD$3000 from Tesco ATM’s in the UK. Thankfully I shouldn’t have any issues in paying back the withdrawn cash - I’ve been told the bank covers this. This does present a new hurdle in that now that I’ve had to cancel my VISA card! How am I going to shop????
